commit.message:
Merge #10667

10667: internal: Expose version string of crates from HIR r=Veykril a=Veykril

Fixes https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/10664

Co-authored-by: Lukas Wirth <lukastw97@gmail.com>
